column1: Uchi////Had reservations and seated promptly. Yeah!  Very exceited about eating here after hearing such rave reviews.  Unfortunately
column2: other than being seated promptly and our server
column4: there is little that we liked.  Dishes were mediocre
column6: and overpriced.  After spending $245.00 don't expect to come home and make a chicken sandwich!  Setting was OK
column7: but nothing over the top.  The valet brought our car around to us only to find my carpet filthy dirty with mud! :(
